name: Project Funding
description: This module scales tower damage based on the amount of cash you have, creating a direct relationship between wealth and combat effectiveness.

context_fields.when_to_use: When you have high cash amounts and want damage scaling based on wealth
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Focus on higher rarity versions for better scaling
counter_strategies: Most effective with high cash amounts
context_fields.resource_efficiency: Very High - scales with cash accumulation

notes: Project Funding will not go below a multiplier of x1.00 and has an effective multiplier of (1+Log(cash)*rarityMult)
unique_effect: Tower damage is multiplied by [x]% of the number of digits in your current cash
